akn:section.akn:heading: Favored producer of title insurer; buyerâ€™s right to choose.

akn:content.akn:p: A title insurer shall not participate in any transaction in which it knows that a title insurance producer or other person requires, directly or indirectly, or through any trustee, director, officer, producer, employee, or affiliate, as a condition precedent to selling or furnishing any other person a loan, or loan extension, credit, sale, property, contract, lease, or service, that the other person shall place a title insurance policy of any kind with the title insurer or through a particular title insurance producer.
No seller of property shall require, directly or indirectly, that the buyer purchase title insurance from any particular title producer or insurer.
